skill_constraints: Key person dependencies in DevOps, QA, and senior-level tasks (RISK-007).
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer availability for security-critical and complex features.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive pair programming, mock APIs for parallel work.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new senior full-stack developer.
mitigation_strategies: Add a senior full-stack developer to offload both frontend and backend critical tasks.

skill_constraints: Deferring complex offline sync feature reduces risk and frees up senior frontend capacity.
resource_bottlenecks: Still dependent on senior dev for security sandbox.
mitigation_strategies: De-scope the offline synchronization feature (US-060) to a future release.
